Module com.cab302.wellbeing.model
Package com.cab302.wellbeing.controller

Class SetTimeLimitController

java.lang.Object
com.cab302.wellbeing.controller.SetTimeLimitController
public class SetTimeLimitController extends Object
This class is a controller for the Set Time Limit functionality in the application. It provides methods to handle the time limit setting.

  • Method Details

    • setTimeLimits

      public void setTimeLimits(int hours, int minutes, int seconds, boolean active, String limitType)
      This method is used to parse the time limits.
      Parameters:
      hours - - the hours that parsed from previous scene
      minutes - - the minutes that parsed from previous scene
      seconds - - the seconds that parsed from previous scene
      active - - the active status that parsed from previous scene
      limitType - - the limit type that parsed from previous scene

    • setFirstName

      Parameters:
      firstName - - the first name that parsed from previous scene
